Apollo Justice.quote: Only a clown would know where the circus is!
Don't worry. I was up at 5 A.M. practicing my "Chords of Steel!"

Franziska von Karma.quote: Foolish fool who foolishly dreams of foolish dreams...
A fool can only understand a foolish foolery utterer by the most foolish of fools.
Silence fool! You are to respond with the whole truth! No fractions!
A foolhardy folly of a foolish statement by an equally foolishly foolhardy fool.
A fool who doesn't think is more foolish than a fool who foolishly thinks.
Foolish fool spouting foolish foolishness, just as I expect of a foolish fool such as you.

Judge.quote: It looks like the defense was just playing with himself.

Luke Atmey.quote: Here I am! The tragic clown...

Miles Edgeworth.quote: Only two pieces? I believe the proper phrase here is, "you fail."
The guilty will always lie, to avoid being found out. There's no way to tell who is guilty and who is innocent!
When you've run into a wall with no place to go, return to the basics.
Have you just been rambling all this time without any sense of inner monologue!?
You are not a clown. You are the entire circus.

Phoenix Wright.quote: Our school had a saying: "When something smells, it's usually the Butz." In the 23 years I've known him, it's usually been true.
